title: Noddlesman
author: Noddlesman
content: I heard Bitcoin in 2021, and I was introduced to Bitcoin in 21:10:2021 by my friend, the first time when my friend introduced me to Bitcoin I was not an interested, because of fear, and I don't want to be scammed.But later I start to have an interest on Bitcoin, because of the way my friend is living his life. But when I start to have an interest on it, my friend who was positioning me, travel out or let me say relocate that is how I missed my chance to learn Bitcoin more dipper. And  according the (Linguistics) they said opportunities comes but ones that is how I lost my opportunity. I don't want miss this chance now. This year is my third year anniversary in  Bitcoin, but I'm not perfect to invest, but I will try my best to learn more and to acquire more  knowledge, and learn how to invest. I thank God that I search or found this forum, and also I appreciate my gee who advertise this forum to me. I believe I will learn more from forum.

comments.author: decodx
comments.body: Hey, welcome and congrats on diving into the world of Bitcoin and your enthusiasm to learn more!You don't necessarily need a special teacher or tutor to expand your knowledge. Luckily, there are plenty of resources out there to assist you. Aside from this forum, you should explore reputable educational websites, attend webinars or conferences, read books or articles on Bitcoin and cryptocurrency, and follow trusted experts in the field. While learning from successful Bitcoin investors like your friend can be valuable, don't forget the power of self-learning. Many of us here are self-taught to some extent, and there's a wealth of information available online to guide you. So, don't hesitate to explore and educate yourself independently.

comments.author: Awaklara
comments.body: so you are now starting to focus because you see the success of your friends who tell you about Bitcoin? This may be a regret for you because you didn't believe in it before, you were even afraid. but now hopefully you start with more confidence and more experience.My advice is just to focus on your Bitcoin. don't be swayed by the whispers of people around you about altcoins and shitcoins that can make you rich quickly. just focus on what you are currently starting.welcome to the forum.

comments.author: Mr.right85
comments.body: There is always a fear that takes hold of everyone once they hear of a new innovation or means of making some money offline. Fortunately, bitcoin wasn't always about making money and isn't really about making money as it is money itself but, the dynamics to its nature as both currency and asset has resulted in most seeing it for an investment option than currency.It's not difficult to relate to OP's fears with the number of scams that occurs everyday on the Web and with just as much using cryptocurrency for a payment media. This shouldn't shy you away from the currency rather, you should try to understand and play safe about your investment when you do invest.Don't let little fears scare you from getting in early instead, use the energy to learn how to protect your investment.Welcome to the olace where you can learn.

comments.author: un_rank
comments.body: Quote from: Noddlesman on June 03, 2023, 12:04:13 PMThis year is my third year anniversary in  Bitcoin, but I'm not perfect to invest, but I will try my best to learn more and to acquire more  knowledge, and learn how to invest. You were introduced to Bitcoin in late 2021 and from then to now is less than 2 years, you were also not interested in bitcoin at the time so it took you a couple of months to try it out. Give yourself a target of a month or two to get to understand the basics of security and wallet, and then maybe another month to study the market, DCA strategy and best places to buy. At the end of this experiment you would be a better investor and be able to buy and safely store your bitcoins.Do not rush the process, pick a time-frame that is comfortable for you.- Jay -

You are lucky because bitcoin is almost half the price when compared to it's ATH price.So the buying opportunity is good right now and you can save some capital to buy more later instead of going all in.But yeah, before buying bitcoin get all the basics cleared about, wallets, transactions, address, private keys etc...

comments.author: Accardo
comments.body: Opportunity is always available for everyone. As of 2021 they was a massage pump in the market, but before the pump the price of Bitcoin was not more than what it is today. It was dangling around this amount before it kicked to 30k to 60k. What is expected of you is to get ready with the possible knowledge you can and invest on bitcoin what you can afford to lose. As nobody can predict if the market will pump further or fall again. Stay close to the person that introduced you to bitcoin they may have other things to teach you in the market. However, welcome to the forum.

comments.author: Daniel91
comments.body: I don't understand why you think you missed anything with Bitcoin? Bitcoin is here, and will be there for years to come, and you are not late for anything  You can easily find all the information about bitcoin that interests you on the Internet and you don't need anyone's help for that.As for investing in bitcoin or crypto in general, you should be aware that every investment is risky and that's why I advise you to first get well informed about everything, make your investment decision based on a detailed analysis and all the facts and to determine specific investment goals and a clear exit strategy.

comments.author: SatoPrincess
comments.body: Quote from: Noddlesman on June 03, 2023, 12:04:13 PMBut later I start to have an interest on Bitcoin, because of the way my friend is living his life. But when I start to have an interest on it, my friend who was positioning me, travel out or let me say relocate that is how I missed my chance to learn Bitcoin more dipper. So you are here because of FOMO, it’s okay to be drawn to bitcoin because of the success stories of others and yes there is profit to be made from bitcoin investments that doesn’t mean bitcoin is a get rich quick scheme. It’s never too late to get into bitcoin, you don’t need a physical person to guide you, the world has gone digital and you can find everything you need on the web. You can learn from youtube videos, GitHub and of course bitcointalk, there are tons of materials here that can help you get started, just use the forum search engine.

comments.author: Hyphen(-)
comments.body: First of all, welcome to the Bitcointalk forum.This forum can be the best forum you have ever visited because I am sure you will get all you want here because the forum users are always here to help.Just like other forums and communities, this forum has its own rules and regulations that govern the forum's activities; therefore, I will suggest that you go through the Unofficial list of (official) Bitcointalk.org rules, guidelines, FAQ so that you don't go against any of the forum rules.You don't actually need a special teacher about Bitcoin; you can feel free to drop your questions here anytime. Moreover, you can visit here for basic knowledge about Bitcoin.

comments.author: Stepstowealth
comments.body: Since you missed your first opportunity because of lack of interest and fear, you need to now hold this second opportunity you have now more seriously. Since I joined this forum, I do not take what I learn here for granted. I count myself amongst the lucky individuals who are in luck to even know about this forum. Learning about Bitcoins would have been close to impossible for me since it can get boring, but this forum has made learning interesting. You can do well within a few years just like the friend who first introduced you to Bitcoins, but you have to become serious with learning just like others.

comments.author: demonica
comments.body: At least you're now here. It's common for others to take some time before finally deciding to start investing and learn about Bitcoin after being introduced to it. It's mostly because they are afraid of risking or they worry about being scammed but it's normal to be afraid since it involves money. But you don't have to worry about the "opportunities you've missed" because even without you friend's help who introduced Bitcoin to you, you can still discover and learn things by researching or with the help of the forum. There are a lot of opportunities our here. Goodluck!
